text:
SALEM

Periyar University: Village Adoption Scheme, Department of Sociology and Department of Textile and Apparel Designing, short term embroidery training programme for the SHG members, 10 a.m.; Department of Computer Science: workshop on ‘bio-data analytics’, sessions, 10 am; Department of Biotechnology, signing of MoU with Victus Laboratories India Private Limited, Coimbatore and AURA Biotechnologies Private Limited, Chennai, C. Swaminathan, vice chancellor, presides, 10.30 a.m.

Sona College of Technology: Department of Information Technology conducts PORT 2K16,

10 a.m.

CSI Polytechnic College: Inauguration of project exhibition, CSI PROEX 2016, 9.30 a.m.

Sri Ayyappan Bajanai Mandali Annadhana Trust: Mahasivarathri, natyanjali and upanyasam, Maha Sivarathri festival, bharathanatyam by Abarna Ramesh and troupe, 5.30 p.m. and by Sujatha Panneerselvam troupe, Sri Dharmasastha Ashramam, Town Railway Station Road, 7.30 p.m.

NAMAKKAL

Excel Engineering College, Komarapalayam: Department of ECE, seminar on Wireless technology in Agriculture and Rural Development, 11 a.m.

Mahendra Educational Institutions, Mallasamudram: Womens’ Day celebrations, 9.30 a.m.

Paavai Arts and Science College for Women: NSS special camp, Government School, Kozhingipatti, 11 a.m.
title: engagements
